info.title: Infrastructure
info.description:
The Infrastructure API provides endpoints for gateway and field controller management, including:
* Registering & managing site gateways
* Creating & managing DDC field controllers

**Managing Site Gateways**

A site gateway is a physical device placed on the BAS network and provides the connection to the Counterbalance cloud. A site gateway must first be purchased and registered with a tenant account before it will be accessible in the console and this process is outlined in the Register Gateway endpoint.

**Quotas and Licensing**

Site management is a paid feature. Physical sites are subject to quota availability. Virtual sites and buildings are not measured against a pre-defined quota but require a seperate license. These requirments are outlined in the various endpoint docs.

If insufficient quota or licensing exists for the specified site type, a `403 Forbidden` error will be thrown and the site will not be created.

get.description:
### Synopsis
Get a list of available gateway devices

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:list`

post.description:
### Synopsis
Activate a new gateway device and register it with a tenant account

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:register`
* Adequate gateway quota
* A physical gateway device serial number

### Gateway Serial Number
A valid gateway serial number is required in order to activate a new gateway. The serial number is found on the bottom of the device or by loading the web GUI of the gateway.

### Registration Process
The registration of a gateway is a two-step process. First, the gateway device must be created and assigned a tenant account using this endpoint. 

A successful creation will generate a unique gateway UUID and a registration PIN. These values will be emailed to the authenticated user and will be needed to link the device.

Second, the Register Gateway Device endpoint is used from the device to link it with the tenant account using the newly registered UUID and registration secret.

get.description:
### Synopsis
Retrieve a gateway device

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:read`

### Checking Gateway Vitals

parameters.name: online
parameters.description: Query the gateway for vitals and statistics

patch.description:
### Synopsis
Update a gateway device

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:update`

delete.description:
### Synopsis
Delete a gateway device

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:delete`

### Connected Controllers
When a gateway is deleted, the connected controllers are retained but all data collection activities will stop, building intelligence rules will be unavailable, and any associated meters will be in fault. 

A controller can be re-associated with an active gateway via the [Update Controller](/reference/Infrastructure.v1.json/paths/~1v1~1infrastructure~1gateway~1%7BgatewayId%7D/patch) endpoint.

get.description:
List the available field controllers on the specified gateway

**Prerequisites** 

The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* A configured site gateway with Internet access
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:query`

List available field controllers in a tenant account

**Prerequisites** 

The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:controller:*`,`infrastructure:controller:list`

parameters.name: gateway
parameters.description: Limit the listing to the specified gateway ID

parameters.name: site
parameters.description: Limit the listing to the specified site ID

post.description:
### Synopsis
Send a BACnet Who-Is to the network and review responsive field controllers

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* An activated site gateway with Internet access
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`infrastructure:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:*`,`infrastructure:gateway:query`

Gateway-Details.title: Gateway Details
Gateway-Details.description: The data returned for a specified gateway UUID

serial.description: The serial number of the gateway

description.description: A brief description of the gateway

unmanaged_devices.description: An array of devies available but not yet managed

online_devices.description: A list of BACnet device instance IDs that are online

offline_devices.description: A list of BACnet device instance IDs that are managed and not responding

new_devices_available.description: Indicates if new devices are available for management

Gateway-Vitals.description: The information returned by the gateway device when it is queried for vitals
Gateway-Vitals.title: Gateway Vitals

name.description: A display name for the new gateway

location.description: A brief description of the device (location, config, etc)

description.description: A brief description of the gateway

location.description: The installed location of the device

error.console: The gateway ID ... could not be found in the database
